data.title: Boca Pointe Community Association
data.meta_description: Official website for the Boca Pointe Community Association in Boca Raton, Florida.
data.text:
Welcome to the website for Boca Pointe residents and those interested in our community.

Boca Pointe is a 1000 acre master planned community located just outside the city limits of Boca Raton, in southern most Palm Beach County, Florida. It includes the Club at Boca Pointe, Boardwalk at SW 18th Street, and over 4,000 residences within 29 diversified Villages.

If you are a visitor to our community, please explore the links on this page. If you are a Boca Pointe resident, please log in to access all areas of the website. Residents registering for the first time should contact Access Control for the Community Code and then click on the âNot Registered Yet?â link above.
